title: Studying Anatomy? Assimalhakeem -JAL
transcript: louie from canada says am i allowed to study anatomy so it's a special specific science that studies the human body has nothing to do with uh evolution and darwin theory etc there's no problem in studying that what is a problem studying it would help you understand how the human body works how chemicals and certain medication impact it what would happen if we take an organ or replace another with that or all of this is permissible inshallah without any problem you
